infoBlock.title: Get to know me!
infoBlock.paragraph1: I'm a <important>Frontend Web Developer</important> building the Front-end of Websites and Web Applications that leads to the success of the overall product. Check out some of my work in the <important>Projects</important> section.
infoBlock.paragraph2: I'm open to <important>Job</important> opportunities where I can contribute, learn and grow. If you have a good opportunity that matches my skills and experience then don't hesitate to <important>contact</important> me.
